steps: Slice pears in half and gently scoop out seeds using a small cookie scoop or spoon.
Place pear halves cut-side up on a baking pan or oven-proof dish.
Drizzle each pear half with 1/2 tsp maple syrup and sprinkle with 1/4 tsp cinnamon.
Bake until soft and tender, approximately 25-30 minutes.
title: Baked Pears with Cinnamon
